title: Jairus Ondiegi
details:
Jairus Ondiegi Otieno is an accomplished Advocate of the High Court of Kenya, renowned for his expertise in dispute resolution. With a solid educational foundation and extensive professional experience, he has established himself as a dedicated and effective legal practitioner. 

Educational Background:
- Bachelor of Laws (LL.B) - Moi University
- Postgraduate Diploma in Law - Kenya School of Law

Professional Experience:
- **Milimani Law Courts**: Jairus has significant experience handling various legal matters, gaining invaluable courtroom experience. His role involved representing clients in civil and criminal cases, drafting legal documents, and providing sound legal advice.
- **Wangari Ndiragu and Co. Advocates**: At Wangari Ndiragu and Co. Advocates, Jairus honed his skills in dispute resolution, working on complex cases and providing expert legal counsel.

Professional Affiliations:
- Law Society of Kenya (LSK)
- East Africa Law Society (EALS)

Specializations:
- Dispute Resolution
- Civil and Criminal Litigation
- Legal Research and Drafting
- Client Representation and Advisory

Jairus is committed to providing exceptional legal services with a focus on resolving disputes efficiently and effectively.

title: Annete Atuti
details:
Annette Atuti is a distinguished Advocate of the High Court of Kenya, bringing a wealth of experience in both public and private legal practice. 

Educational Background:
- Bachelor of Laws (LL.B) - African Nazarene University
- Postgraduate Diploma in Law - Kenya School of Law

Professional Experience:
- **Independent Policing Oversight Authority (IPOA)**: Annette played a crucial role in overseeing and promoting transparency and accountability within the police service, ensuring adherence to legal and human rights standards.
- **Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA)**: She applied her legal expertise to tax administration, handling litigation, providing legal advice, and ensuring compliance with regulatory frameworks.

Professional Skills:
- Litigation and Dispute Resolution
- Legal Research and Drafting
- Regulatory Compliance
- Human Rights Advocacy
- Tax Law and Policy

Professional Affiliations:
- Law Society of Kenya (LSK)
- East Africa Law Society (EALS)

Annette is dedicated to upholding the rule of law and advocating for the rights of her clients.

title: Brian Odiwuor
details:
Brian Odiwuor is an Advocate of the High Court of Kenya and a seasoned Tax Law Expert.

Educational Background:
- Bachelor of Laws - University of Nairobi
- Postgraduate Diploma - Kenya School of Law
- Certified Public Accountant (CPA-K)

Professional Experience:
- **ACTED**: Contributed significantly in tax law advisory and legal compliance.
- **Bowmanâ€™s**: Worked extensively in taxation, regulatory compliance, and litigation.

Professional Skills:
- Tax Law and Policy
- Corporate Legal Advisory
- Litigation and Regulatory Compliance

Professional Affiliations:
- Law Society of Kenya (LSK)

title: Denish Awajo
details:
Denish Awajo is an accomplished ICT Lead with a specialized background in Business Information Technology. 

Educational Background:
- Bachelor of Business Information Technology (BBIT) - Technical University of Kenya

Professional Experience:
- **National Treasury**: Managed ICT projects, ensuring the security and efficiency of information systems while implementing strategic initiatives to enhance operational effectiveness.
- **McKinsey & Company - Forward Learning Program**: Developed expertise in leadership, problem-solving, and strategic thinking.

Professional Skills:
- Leadership and Management
- ICT Strategy and Implementation
- Project Management
- Business Process Optimization

Professional Affiliations:
- Member of the Institute of Administration Management (IAM)
- McKinsey & Company Forward Learning Program Alumni

Denish is dedicated to leveraging his expertise in business technology to drive organizational success.

title: Paul Okoth
details:
Paul Okoth is a seasoned leader with a multifaceted background. He holds a Mechanical Engineering degree from the Technical University of Mombasa, where he served as the Student Council Secretary-General. Additionally, he earned a Nursing Diploma from Kendu Adventist Hospital, where he was the Student Council President.

Paul is also a corporate MC and a passionate leader who excels in administrative roles, combining technical expertise with strong leadership skills to drive success in various capacities.
